exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} l : list (A * list bool) b : bool H : A Unable to unify "A" with "~ In (H, nil) (map (fun v : A * list bool => let (a1, b1) := v in (a1, b :: b1)) l)".
Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.
